Code & Coffee

Code & Coffees are hosted bi-weekly. BYO-Projects and laptops for a fun, informal way to learn, code and work on projects with other members in the community. From Rails to Javascript to CodeAcademy and HTML/CSS, these events are open to all. Feel free to come early or stay later. Beginners welcome.

Find the next Code & Coffee and RSVP on Meetup.

Hosted on GitHub Pages.
